Hero customization feature

Gender issue (phase 1)

  • new layer: underwear_gender (man, woman, none)
  • bodies (man, woman) → human (everyone naked)

Skin color issue

  • bodies human → human_[white,black,brown,yellow, etc]
  • bodies gnoll → gnoll_[brown, pink, violet, etc]
  • heads head_class_subclass → head_race_skinColor (no hairs at all on heads)
  • hands class_animation → race_skinColor_animation

or!

Define palette remap from current skin to all new colors.
